| Category                                                           | Provision / Rule                                                                                                                                                          |
| Scheme Name                                                        | Kisan Vikas Patra Scheme, 2019                                                                                                                                            |
| Legal Authority                                                    | Section 3A, Government Savings Promotion Act, 1873                                                                                                                        |

| Joint A-Type Account                                               | Up to three adults; payable to all jointly or to survivors                                                                                                                |

| YEAR                                                               | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                                                                      |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Joint B-Type Account                                               | Up to three adults; payable to any one or survivors                                                                                                                       |
| Minimum Deposit Amount                                             | ₹1,000                                                                                                                                                                    |
| Deposit Denomination                                               | Multiples of ₹100                                                                                                                                                         |
| Maximum Deposit Limit                                              | No maximum limit                                                                                                                                                          |
| Number of Accounts Allowed                                         | Any number of accounts per individual                                                                                                                                     |
| Maturity Period (12-12-2019 to 31-03-2020)                         | 9 years and 5 months                                                                                                                                                      |
| Maturity Period (on or after 01-04-2020)                           | 10 years and 4 months                                                                                                                                                     |
| Maturity Value                                                     | Deposit doubles on maturity                                                                                                                                               |
| Determination of Maturity                                          | Based on interest rate applicable at time of opening                                                                                                                      |
| Repayment on Maturity                                              | On application in Form-2                                                                                                                                                  |
| Premature Closure – Permitted Cases                                | Death of account holder(s); forfeiture by pledgee (Gazetted Officer); court order                                                                                         |
| Premature Closure (Before 2½ Years)                                | Principal + simple interest at Post Office Savings Account rate                                                                                                           |

| Pledging / Transfer as Security                                    | Permitted                                                                                                                                                                 |

| Special Condition (Minor/Unsound Mind)                             | Guardian must certify benefit and survival                                                                                                                                |
| Endorsement on Pledge                                              | “Transferred as security to ……”                                                                                                                                           |
| Status of Transferee                                               | Deemed depositor until re-transfer                                                                                                                                        |
| Re-transfer of Account                                             | Allowed with written authority and official sanction                                                                                                                      |
| Disabled Depositor Provision                                       | May pledge through authorised literate individual                                                                                                                         |
| Transfer of Account – Permitted Cases                              | Death; court order; pledging; death of joint holder                                                                                                                       |
